about_the_game:
👨‍✈️ Hello, soldier! The time has come to join the ranks of the defenders of our homeland. Goodbye civilian life, hello elite fighter status - you are now not just a citizen, you are a military specialist, a UAV operator.

⚙️ We announce mobilization:
1. Control the drones: Take control of the latest developments in unmanned technology.
2. Important missions: Your every action matters, your every order can defeat the enemy. You are in the center of the storming events!
3. Feel the burden of responsibility: Your decisions affect the course of battles and the outcome of the war.

✨ Realistic gameplay:
- Realistic drone control, taking into account many factors, including weather conditions.
- Locations recreated based on real locations. Whether it's snowy mountains, dusty deserts or urban jungles, each map will give you a unique combat experience.
- Current examples of military equipment are made with attention to detail, reflecting their real power and capabilities.

🌟 Simulator features:
- Intense combat operations: Each round requires strategic thinking, quick reactions and precision.
- Training and career growth: Learn to operate a variety of UAVs, move up the career ladder and receive new titles.
- The spirit of competition: Assess your capabilities in a global ranking where everyone is able to make their mark.

🛰️ Level up your skills by taking on the role of a UAV Operator in this realistic simulator. Are you ready to become part of history? Show what you can do!

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains scenes of battles and the destruction of enemies and enemy equipment.

In the meantime, we recommend that you do not forget to add our game to the wishlist.
